dcterms:creator: M. Papageorgiou
H. Hadj-salem
J. Blosseville
dcterms:description: ALINEA is a real-time ramp metering strategy that controls the ramp input traffic flow by monitoring the traffic occupancy on the mainstream. It calculates the metering rate in each cycle to keep the main road stream stable and mitigate congestion.
dcterms:title: ALINEA

dcterms:creator: E. Smaragdis
M. Papageorgiou
E. Kosmatopoulos
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a flow-maximizing adaptive local ramp metering strategy aimed at optimizing traffic flow on freeways.
dcterms:title: Flow-Maximizing Adaptive Local Ramp Metering Strategy

dcterms:creator: Y. Kan
Y. Wang
M. Papageorgiou
I. Papamichail
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on local ramp metering strategies in the presence of distant downstream bottlenecks, providing a comparative study of various approaches.
dcterms:title: Local Ramp Metering with Distant Downstream Bottlenecks

dcterms:creator: G. Gomes
R. Horowitz
dcterms:description: This dataset presents an optimal freeway ramp metering strategy using the asymmetric cell transmission model, focusing on maximizing throughput.
dcterms:title: Optimal Freeway Ramp Metering Using the Asymmetric Cell Transmission Model

dcterms:creator: X. Ma
A. Karimpour
Y. J. Wu
dcterms:description: This dataset evaluates the statistical requirements for ramp metering performance assessment, providing insights into data needs for effective ramp metering.
dcterms:title: Statistical Evaluation of Data Requirement for Ramp Metering Performance Assessment

dcterms:creator: K. Rezaee
B. Abdulhai
H. Abdelgawad
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the application of reinforcement learning with continuous state space to ramp metering in real-world conditions.
dcterms:title: Application of Reinforcement Learning with Continuous State Space to Ramp Metering in Real-World Conditions

dcterms:creator: K. Rezaee
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a decentralized coordinated optimal ramp metering strategy using multi-agent reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Decentralized Coordinated Optimal Ramp Metering Using Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning

dcterms:creator: T. Schmidt-Dumont
J. H. van Vuuren
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses decentralized reinforcement learning for ramp metering and variable speed limits on highways.
dcterms:title: Decentralised Reinforcement Learning for Ramp Metering and Variable Speed Limits on Highways

dcterms:creator: F. Belletti
D. Haziza
G. Gomes
A. M. Bayen
dcterms:description: This dataset presents expert-level control of ramp metering based on multi-task deep reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Expert Level Control of Ramp Metering Based on Multi-Task Deep Reinforcement Learning

dcterms:creator: C. Lu
J. Huang
L. Deng
J. Gong
dcterms:description: This dataset explores coordinated ramp metering with equity considerations using reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Coordinated Ramp Metering with Equity Consideration Using Reinforcement Learning

dcterms:creator: F. VrbaniÄ‡
E. Ivanjko
K. KuÅ¡iÄ‡
D. ÄŒakija
dcterms:description: This dataset reviews variable speed limits and ramp metering for mixed traffic flows, discussing open questions in the field.
dcterms:title: Variable Speed Limit and Ramp Metering for Mixed Traffic Flows
